column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////My favorite place!! I have always been one of those people that couldn't decide what to eat and always ended up over ordering.  So Tapas is perfect for me.  I know it's a Let us entertain you restaurant so it's not a special find or anything
column2: but it is my favorite restaurant.  Sangria is amazing I get the white passion
column3: and here is a list in no special order of my favorite hot tapas...
